meanings.definition: Having qualities traditionally associated with men, such as strength or courage.
meanings.sent1: He was the manliest warrior in the village, always ready to protect others.
meanings.sent2: The knight in shining armor was considered the manliest hero in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The manliest lumberjack in town could chop down a tree with one swing of his axe.
meanings.sent4: His determination to climb the mountain was as manliest as his will to succeed in life.
meanings.sent5: The manliest roar of the lion echoed through the jungle, asserting its dominance.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is most characteristic of a man.
meanings.sent1: He walked manliest into the room, exuding confidence and authority.
meanings.sent2: The cowboy rode manliest across the open plains, with the wind in his hair.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked manliest, skillfully flipping the pancakes in the air.
meanings.sent4: The athlete ran manliest towards the finish line, determined to win the race.
meanings.sent5: The musician played the guitar manliest, captivating the audience with his talent.
